name: Light Marinara Ã  la Vodka
preparation: Cook pasta in Multipurpose Pot according to package directions. Drain.
Simmer Marinara Sauce with vodka and milk in a Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup for 10 minutes to let flavours blend. Stir in Parmesan.
Toss with hot pasta and serve.
tips: Partly skimmed milk is a great substitute for heavy cream.

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavour of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.
